description.zh-cn: 香港商人及政治人物，曾任第十一届全国政协委员，早期为梁振英的坚定支持者，后与其反目并转为尖锐批评者。
description.en: A Hong Kong businessman and political figure, former member of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC. He was an early staunch supporter of Leung Chun-ying but later had a falling out and became a sharp critic.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，曾任香港特别行政区行政长官，是刘梦熊政治生涯中的关键人物，二人关系由紧密盟友转为公开对立。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician who served as the Chief Executive of the HKSAR. He is a key figure in Lew Mon-hung's political life, with their relationship shifting from close allies to public adversaries.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式，是中国共产党领导的多党合作和政治协商的重要机构。刘梦熊曾任其第十一届委员。
description.en: The organizational form of the Chinese People's Patriotic United Front, and an important institution for multi-party cooperation and political consultation led by the Communist Party of China. Lew Mon-hung served as a member of its 11th National Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2012年举行的香港特别行政区行政长官选举，刘梦熊在此期间曾强烈支持梁振英参选。
description.en: The election for the Chief Executive of the HKSAR held in 2012, during which Lew Mon-hung strongly supported Leung Chun-ying's candidacy.

nodes.id: 香港特别行政区第四届政府

zh-cn: 香港特别行政区第四届政府

description.zh-cn: 由行政长官梁振英领导的香港特别行政区政府。刘梦熊在与梁振英反目后，对此届政府持强烈批评态度。
description.en: The government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region led by Chief Executive Leung Chun-ying. After his falling out with Leung, Lew Mon-hung became a strong critic of this administration.

description.zh-cn: 2012年香港特首选举期间，梁振英竞选阵营成员（包括刘梦熊）与乡绅及江湖人物郭永鸿的一次争议性会面，旨在为梁振英拉票。
description.en: A controversial meeting during the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election between members of Leung Chun-ying's campaign team (including Lew Mon-hung), rural leaders, and triad figure Kwok Wing-hung, aimed at canvassing votes for Leung.

description.zh-cn: 香港的独立反贪机构，负责调查与东方明珠石油相关的案件，并拘捕了刘梦熊。
description.en: Hong Kong's independent anti-corruption agency, which investigated the Pearl Oriental Oil case and arrested Lew Mon-hung.

description.zh-cn: 时任香港廉政专员，在东方明珠案调查期间，曾收到刘梦熊要求终止调查的信件。
description.en: The then Commissioner of the Hong Kong ICAC, who received letters from Lew Mon-hung demanding the termination of the investigation into the Pearl Oriental case.

nodes.id: 刘梦熊妨碍司法公正案

zh-cn: 刘梦熊妨碍司法公正案

description.zh-cn: 刘梦熊因在东方明珠案调查期间，发信威胁时任特首梁振英及廉政专员白韫六，要求中止调查，而被控妨碍司法公正并最终罪成入狱的案件。
description.en: The case in which Lew Mon-hung was charged and ultimately convicted and imprisoned for perverting the course of justice by sending threatening letters to then-Chief Executive Leung Chun-ying and ICAC Commissioner Simon Peh, demanding a halt to the Pearl Oriental investigation.

nodes.id: 华南师范大学附属中学

zh-cn: 华南师范大学附属中学

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，梁振英在2012年行政长官选举中的主要竞争对手。刘梦熊曾公开敦促其退选。
description.en: Hong Kong politician and Leung Chun-ying's main rival in the 2012 Chief Executive election. Lew Mon-hung publicly urged him to withdraw from the race.

description.zh-cn: 唐英年于2012年特首选举期间被揭发其住宅存在违章建筑，严重打击其选情。
description.en: A scandal during the 2012 Chief Executive election where unauthorized building works were discovered at Henry Tang's residence, severely damaging his campaign.

description.zh-cn: 香港江湖人物，曾出席“流浮山小桃园饭局”，与刘梦熊等梁振英竞选团队成员会面。
description.en: A Hong Kong triad figure who attended the 'Lau Fau Shan Small Peach Garden dinner' and met with members of Leung Chun-ying's campaign team, including Lew Mon-hung.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，时任梁振英竞选办公室要员，曾与刘梦熊一同出席“流浮山小桃园饭局”。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician and a key member of Leung Chun-ying's campaign office at the time, who attended the 'Lau Fau Shan Small Peach Garden dinner' with Lew Mon-hung.

description.zh-cn: 中国最高领导人。2012年两会期间，时任主管港澳事务的习近平曾与刘梦熊握手，此事引起媒体关注。
description.en: The paramount leader of China. During the Two Sessions in 2012, Xi Jinping, then in charge of Hong Kong and Macau affairs, shook hands with Lew Mon-hung, an incident that drew media attention.

description.zh-cn: 上市公司东方明珠石油主席，与刘梦熊一同因涉嫌行贿受贿被廉政公署拘捕。
description.en: Chairman of the listed company Pearl Oriental Oil, who was arrested by the ICAC along with Lew Mon-hung on suspicion of bribery.

description.zh-cn: 香港上市公司，刘梦熊曾任其副主席。该公司的一项石油业务投资引发了廉政公署的调查，并导致刘梦熊被捕及定罪。
description.en: A Hong Kong listed company where Lew Mon-hung served as vice-chairman. An investment in an oil business by the company triggered an ICAC investigation, leading to Lew's arrest and conviction.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆维权人士，“结石宝宝之家”发起人，为三聚氰胺毒奶粉事件受害儿童维权。刘梦熊曾公开声援他。
description.en: A mainland Chinese rights activist and founder of 'Kidney Stone Babies Home,' advocating for child victims of the melamine-tainted milk scandal. Lew Mon-hung publicly supported him.

description.zh-cn: 北京大学教授，曾发表辱骂港人的言论，刘梦熊对此予以批评。
description.en: A professor at Peking University whose derogatory remarks about Hong Kong people were criticized by Lew Mon-hung.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，曾任香港特别行政区行政长官。刘梦熊曾批评其施政水平为“三流政客”。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician who served as Chief Executive of the HKSAR. Lew Mon-hung criticized his governance as that of a 'third-rate politician'.

relationships.target: 华南师范大学附属中学
中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任第十一届全国政协委员。
description.en: Served as a member of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 在2012年香港行政长官选举期间，刘梦熊是梁振英的头号支持者，为其积极拉票并公开攻击其对手唐英年。
description.en: During the 2012 Hong Kong Chief Executive election, Lew Mon-hung was a primary supporter of Leung Chun-ying, actively canvassing for him and publicly attacking his opponent Henry Tang.

description.zh-cn: 自2013年与梁振英反目后，刘梦熊公开爆料指梁振英在僭建问题上撒谎，并持续猛烈批评梁及其政府，称其言而无信。
description.en: After their falling out in 2013, Lew Mon-hung publicly accused Leung Chun-ying of lying about unauthorized structures at his home and continued to fiercely criticize Leung and his government, calling him untrustworthy.

description.zh-cn: 据刘梦熊指控，梁振英未兑现邀请其加入行政会议和推荐其担任全国政协常委的承诺，此事成为二人关系破裂的导火索。
description.en: According to Lew Mon-hung's accusations, Leung Chun-ying failed to fulfill his promises to invite him to the Executive Council and recommend him for the CPPCC Standing Committee, which became the catalyst for the breakdown of their relationship.

relationships.target: 香港特别行政区第四届政府

description.zh-cn: 在与梁振英反目后，刘梦熊对梁振英领导的第四届特区政府及其政策展开了强烈批评。
description.en: After his falling out with Leung Chun-ying, Lew Mon-hung launched strong criticisms against the fourth-term HKSAR government led by Leung and its policies.

description.zh-cn: 因怀疑在东方明珠石油业务中涉嫌行贿受贿，廉政公署于2013年1月8日拘捕刘梦熊。
description.en: On January 8, 2013, the ICAC arrested Lew Mon-hung on suspicion of bribery in connection with the business of Pearl Oriental Oil.

description.zh-cn: 作为东方明珠石油主席，黄坤与刘梦熊一同被廉政公署拘捕。
description.en: As the chairman of Pearl Oriental Oil, Wong Kwan was arrested by the ICAC along with Lew Mon-hung.

description.zh-cn: 在东方明珠案调查期间，刘梦熊向时任廉政专员白韫六发信，要求其终止调查，此行为后被裁定为妨碍司法公正。
description.en: During the investigation of the Pearl Oriental case, Lew Mon-hung sent letters to the then ICAC Commissioner Simon Peh, demanding him to terminate the investigation, an act later ruled as perverting the course of justice.

relationships.source: 刘梦熊妨碍司法公正案

description.zh-cn: 刘梦熊因妨碍司法公正罪名成立，于2016年2月29日被判处18个月监禁。
description.en: Lew Mon-hung was sentenced to 18 months in prison on February 29, 2016, after being found guilty of perverting the course of justice.

description.zh-cn: 因妨碍司法公正罪成，刘梦熊于2010年获颁的铜紫荆星章被香港特区政府褫夺。
description.en: Due to his conviction for perverting the course of justice, the Bronze Bauhinia Star awarded to Lew Mon-hung in 2010 was revoked by the HKSAR Government.

description.zh-cn: 在2012年特首选举期间，于唐英年僭建事件曝光后，刘梦熊高调派发《敦促唐英年退选书》，对其选情造成打击。
description.en: During the 2012 Chief Executive election, after the unauthorized structure scandal of Henry Tang was exposed, Lew Mon-hung high-profilely distributed a 'Letter Urging Henry Tang to Withdraw', dealing a blow to his campaign.

description.zh-cn: 该事件严重损害了唐英年的诚信和公众形象，是其竞选失败的关键因素之一。
description.en: The scandal severely damaged Henry Tang's integrity and public image, becoming one of the key factors in his campaign's failure.

description.zh-cn: 该饭局旨在为梁振英密会新界乡绅以争取选票支持，但因涉及江湖人物而引发黑金政治的争议。
description.en: The dinner was intended to secretly meet with New Territories rural leaders to canvass votes for Leung Chun-ying, but it sparked controversy over 'black gold politics' due to the involvement of a triad figure.

description.zh-cn: 2012年3月4日，时任中央政治局常委习近平在北京会见港区政协委员时，最先与刘梦熊握手。
description.en: On March 4, 2012, then-member of the Politburo Standing Committee Xi Jinping first shook hands with Lew Mon-hung when meeting with Hong Kong CPPCC members in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 在流浮山小桃园饭局中会面。
description.en: Met at the Lau Fau Shan Small Peach Garden dinner.

description.zh-cn: 在流浮山小桃园饭局中会面。
description.en: Met at the Lau Fau Shan Small Peach Garden dinner.

description.zh-cn: 公开声援和支持为三聚氰胺奶粉受害儿童维权的赵连海。
description.en: Publicly voiced solidarity with and supported Zhao Lianhai, who advocated for the victims of the melamine-tainted milk powder.

description.zh-cn: 曾公开批评时任特首曾荫权的施政水平为“三流政客”。
description.en: Publicly criticized the governance of then-Chief Executive Donald Tsang as that of a 'third-rate politician'.

description.zh-cn: 就孔庆东发表辱骂港人言论一事，刘梦熊公开批评其言论违背北大精神及和谐社会理念。
description.en: Regarding Kong Qingdong's derogatory remarks about Hong Kong people, Lew Mon-hung publicly criticized his statements as contrary to the spirit of Peking University and the concept of a harmonious society.
